nodes.text: Verona Blue is a Canadian-born, American actress that provided the voice of a female First Order stormtrooper, a First Order control room technician, and a PA announcer on D'Qar's Interior Resistance base, in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. She provided additional voices in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story including the voice of the antenna computer on Scarif and was one of three actresses who voiced the Caretakers in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.
